mapper.select: SELECT r.node_id, s.share_id, n.node_name, r.report_result, r.report_num, r.created_at, r.updated_at FROM ( vika_content_censor_result r INNER JOIN vika_node n ON r.node_id = n.node_id AND r.report_result = #{status} ) INNER JOIN vika_node_share_setting s ON r.node_id = s.node_id ORDER BY r.updated_at DESC
